mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.real_name, u.position, u.department, r.id as role_id, r.role_code, r.role_name FROM anvil_user u, anvil_role r WHERE u.username=#{username} and r.id=u.role

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.real_name, u.position, u.department, r.id as role_id, r.role_code, r.role_name FROM anvil_user u, anvil_role r WHERE r.id=u.role and u.username=#{username} limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anvil_user (username, password, real_name, position, department, role, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{position}, #{department}, #{role}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET anvil_user username=#{username}, password=#{password}, real_name=#{realName}, position=#{position}, department=#{department}, role=#{role}, update_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
